testcase.failure: cucumber.runtime.CucumberException: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [true] but found [false] Caused by: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [true] but found [false]
testcase.system-out:
Feature: Summer Dresses We are on Registration Page We are on SummerDresses Page
Background: # SummerDresses.feature:3 Given the user is on registration page # RegistrationTest.the_user_is_on_registration_page() Then I enter login credentials and click on submit button # RegistrationTest.i_enter_login_credentials_and_click_on_submit_button(DataTable) Then I go to Summer Dresses Page from menu Dresses->Summer Dresses # SummerDressesTest.i_go_to_Summer_Dresses_Page_from_menu_Dresses_Summer_Dresses() Size of price is 3 Values in price is $28.98 Values in price is $30.50 Values in price is $16.40
@SummerDress @Demo Scenario: To verify sort by price ascending works properly # SummerDresses.feature:11 Then I select sort by price Lowest first to check its sorted properly # SummerDressesTest.i_select_sort_by_price_Lowest_first_to_check_its_sorted_properly() java.lang.AssertionError: expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:93) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:512) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:51) at methods.SummerDressesPageMethods.sortByAsc(SummerDressesPageMethods.java:39) at stepDefinitions.SummerDressesTest.i_select_sort_by_price_Lowest_first_to_check_its_sorted_properly(SummerDressesTest.java:36) at ?.Then I select sort by price Lowest first to check its sorted properly(SummerDresses.feature:12)
We are on Registration Page We are on SummerDresses Page
Background: # SummerDresses.feature:3 Given the user is on registration page # RegistrationTest.the_user_is_on_registration_page() Then I enter login credentials and click on submit button # RegistrationTest.i_enter_login_credentials_and_click_on_submit_button(DataTable) Then I go to Summer Dresses Page from menu Dresses->Summer Dresses # SummerDressesTest.i_go_to_Summer_Dresses_Page_from_menu_Dresses_Summer_Dresses()
#@SummerDress @Demo #Scenario: To verify sort by price descending works properly #Then I select sort by price Highest first to check its sorted properly @SummerDress @Demo Scenario: To verify user selects a dress and change color to Blue # SummerDresses.feature:20 Then I select a particular dress # SummerDressesTest.i_select_a_particular_dress() And I verify if I am landed on AddToCart page # AddToCartTest.i_verify_if_I_am_landed_on_AddToCart_page() java.lang.AssertionError: expected [Printed Summer Dress - My Store] but found [] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:93) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:512) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:134) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:189) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:199) at methods.AddToCartPageMethods.validateTitle(AddToCartPageMethods.java:17) at stepDefinitions.AddToCartTest.i_verify_if_I_am_landed_on_AddToCart_page(AddToCartTest.java:25) at ?.And I verify if I am landed on AddToCart page(SummerDresses.feature:22)
Then I change the colour to blue # AddToCartTest.i_change_the_colour_to_blue() And I add the item to cart # AddToCartTest.i_add_the_item_to_cart()
